casebody.data:
LEWIS WALLACE v. THE UNITED STATES.

[No opinion in Court of Claims.

133 U. S. R., 180.] On the claimants Appeal.

The court below dismissed the petition for salary of a minister abroad on the authority of its decision in Frances v. The United States (22 C. Cls. R., 403).

The decision of the court below is affirmed on the same grounds.

Mr. Justice Blatcheobd

delivered the opinion of the Supreme Court January 27, 1890.
